Html: I keep getting an error message upon installation that states that it can't install because I have a more recent version of internet explorer. It states that I need IE8 to install. Please help.
Can you include a screenshot of the error you're seeing? The installer has no dependency on IE, so it shouldn't care what browser you're using.

I just sent you a message. Please disregard and see the posted screenshot.
Any input or guidance would be great!
Thanks - do you see this right away when you run the download, or do you see other dialogs before this error?
That is the only dialog box that comes up.

OK, thanks - I'm a little stumped because setup is the one thing that I don't write (it's generated automatically by Visual Studio). I'm asking around to see if anyone has seen this before and will let you know if I learn anything.
